name: crypto-vibe-dashboard
description: AI-powered Chrome extension showing real-time crypto market sentiment for Herond Browser users.

scripts.build: tsc && vite build && npm run postbuild
scripts.postbuild: cp public/manifest.json dist/ && cp -r public/icons dist/ && mv dist/src/popup/index.html dist/popup.html 2>/dev/null || true && rm -rf dist/src
